institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Internal human resource development support project operation rules/Article 35 (Performance tasks)
contents: Article 35 (Performance Tasks) The Center performs the following tasks: 1. Guidance and consultation on vocational competency development training projects, 2. Discovery of companies participating in training, 3. Vocational competency development training consulting, 4. Corporate customized field training (S -OJT) Consulting (program development) 5. Support for administrative procedures related to training, 6. Other tasks assigned by the Corporation, such as support for new/pilot projects
